string.base: NDAS Software is configured to reject suspend/hibernation request when devices are mounted.\r\nYou can change this behavior from Options - Advanced.
string.translation: NDAS softwaren er konfigureret til at afvise suspend/hibernation forespørgsel, når enheder tilsluttes.\r\nDu kan ændre denne funktion i Indstillinger - Avanceret

string.base: An NDAS device with the name you specified is already registered.\r\nSpecify a different NDAS device name.
string.translation: Der er allerede registreret en NDAS-enhed med det angivne navn.\r\nAngiv et andet NDAS-enhedsnavn.

string.base: An error occurred while checking duplicate NDAS device name.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl ved kontrol af dobbelt NDAS-enhedsnavn.

string.base: This application requires administrative privileges.\r\nLog on as a user in Administrators Group and run this application again.
string.translation: Dette program kræver administratorprivilegier.\r\nLog på som bruger i administratorgruppen og kør dette program igen.

string.base: Loading NDASUSER.DLL failed.\r\nPlease check the installation of the software.
string.translation: Indlæsning af NDASUSER.DLL mislykket.\r\nKontrollér installationen af softwaren.

string.base: Window creation failed. Possibly system is running out of memory.\r\nClose other applications and try again.
string.translation: Kunne ikke danne vindue. Systemet har sandsynligvis ikke mere hukommelse.\r\nLuk andre programmer og prøv igen.

string.base: Incompatible NDASUSER.DLL is installed.\r\nPlease check the installation of the software.
string.translation: Inkompatibel NDASUSER.DLL installeret.\r\nKontrollér installationen af softwaren.

string.base: An error occurred during saving the registration.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl under lagring af registreringen.

string.base: The NDAS device is already registered.
'%1!s!' is registered successfully.\r\nClick the taskbar icon to use the registered NDAS device.
string.translation: '%1!s!' er vellykket registreret.\r\nKlik på taskbar-ikonet for at bruge den registrerede NDAS-enhed.

string.base: An error occurred while reading the file '%1!s!'.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl ved læsning af filen '%1!s!'.

string.base: Dismounting the NDAS device failed because a program is still using it. Close any programs that might be using it, and then try again.
string.translation: Frakobling af NDAS-enheden mislykket fordi et program stadig bruger den. Luk alle programmer, der bruger den, og prøv igen.

string.base: The host (%1!s!) is requesting the Write Access of "%2!s!'s".\r\nDo you want to accept the request and dismount the NDAS device?
string.translation: Værten (%1!s!) anmoder om Skrive-adgang til "%2!s!'s".\r\nVil du acceptere denne anmodning og frakoble NDAS-enheden?

string.base: Connection to the following NDAS devices has been lost.\r\n%1!s!
Connection to the following NDAS devices are restored.\r\n%1!s!
Connection to the following devices are unstable.\r\nThe system is reconnecting to the devices...\r\n%1!s!
string.translation: Forbindelsen til følgende enheder er ustabil.\r\nSystemet genopretter forbindelse til enhederne...\r\n%1!s!

string.base: Are you sure you want to exit from NDAS Device Management?
string.translation: Er du sikker på, at du vil afsluttet styring af NDAS-enhed?

string.base: Are you sure you want to dismount the NDAS device?\r\nThe dismounting may fail if some applications are accessing the NDAS device.
string.translation: Er du sikker på at du vil frakoble NDAS-enheden?\r\nFrakoblingen kan mislykkes, hvis nogle programmer forsøger adgang til NDAS-enheden.

string.base: Are you sure you want to dismount all NDAS devices?\r\nThe dismounting may fail if some applications are accessing the NDAS device.
string.translation: Er du sikker på at du vil frakoble alle NDAS-enheder?\r\nFrakoblingen kan mislykkes, hvis nogle programmer forsøger adgang til NDAS-enheden.

string.base: Are you sure you want to dismount %1!s!?\r\nThe dismounting may fail if some applications are accessing the NDAS device.
string.translation: Er du sikker på at du vil frakoble alle %1!s!?\r\nFrakoblingen kan mislykkes, hvis nogle programmer forsøger adgang til NDAS-enheden.

string.base: Are you sure you want to remove the %1!s!?
string.translation: Er du sikker på, at du vil fjerne %1!s!?

string.base: Are you sure you want to deregister "%1!s!"?
string.translation: Er du sikker på, at du vil afregistrere "%1!s!"?

string.base: This RAID will run in degraded mode due to a missing/defective member and this can cause irreconcilable RAID status. Do you want to continue? (Use NDAS Bind management for more information)
string.translation: Dette RAID vil køre i forringet modus på grund et manglende/defekt element, og dettet kan forårsage uforenelig RAID status. Vil du fortsætte? (Brug NDAS Bind management for mere information)

string.base: Registration is finished successfully and the device is now ready to use.
string.translation: Registrering er vellykket gennemført og enheden er klar til brug.

string.base: Please wait while checking the NDAS device status...
string.translation: Vent venligst mens NDAS-enhedens status kontrolleres...

string.base: Enter the NDAS device ID to register.
string.translation: Indtast NDAS-enhedens ID for at registrere.

string.base: Specify the name for the NDAS device.

The Wizard will guide you through the NADS device registration. Before continuing to the next step, please do the following:

- Connect the NDAS device to the network.
- Turn on the NDAS device.

To continue, click "Next".
string.translation:
Guiden vil lede dig igennem registreringen af NADS-enheden. Inden du fortsætter til næste trin, skal du gøre følgende:

- Forbind NDAS-enheden til netværket.
- Tænd NDAS-enheden.

Klik på Næste for at fortsætte.

string.base: Do you want to mount this NDAS device now?
string.translation: Vil du tilslutte denne NDAS-enhed nu?

string.base: An error has occurred while setting up a Write Key.
string.translation: Der er opstået en fejl under opsætning af Skriv-nøglen (Write key).

string.base: An error occurred while disabling an NDAS device.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl ved deaktivering af en NDAS-enhed.

string.base: An error occurred while enabling an NDAS device.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl ved aktivering af en NDAS-enhed.

string.base: An error occurred while mounting an NDAS device as Read-Only Mode.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl ved tilslutning af en NDAS-enhed som skrivebeskyttet (Read-Only) funktion.

string.base: An error occurred while mounting an NDAS device as Read/Write Mode.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl ved tilslutning af en NDAS-enhed som Læs/Skriv-funktion.
Der opstod en fejl under registreringen.

string.base: An error occurred while removing a Write Key.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl under fjernelse af en Skriv-nøgle (Write key).

string.base: An error occurred while renaming an NDAS device.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl ved omdøbning af en NDAS-enhed.

string.base: An error occurred while dismounting an NDAS device.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl ved frakobling af en NDAS-enhed.

string.base: An error occurred while deregistering an NDAS device.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl ved afregistrering af en NDAS-enhed.

string.base: An error occurred while updating an NDAS device list.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl ved opdatering af en NDAS-enhedsliste.

string.base: NDAS device ID is 20 characters long and it is composed of alphanumeric characters!\r\n
string.translation: NDAS-enhedens ID er 20 tegn lang og er sammensat af alfanumeriske tegn!\r\n

string.base: Changing the user interface language requires application restart. Do you want to restart the application now?
string.translation: Ændring af brugergrænsefladens sprog kræver genstart af programmet. Vil du genstarte programmet nu?

string.base: Do not show the confirmation dialog on exit
You have successfully completed the NDAS device Registration Wizard.\r\n\r\nTo close this wizard, click Finish.
string.translation: Du har vellykket gennemført NDAS-enhedens registreringsguide.\r\n\r\nKlik på Afslut for at lukke denne guide.

string.base:
You have successfully registered the NDAS device. 

However, the NDAS device is not found and cannot be connected at this time. Please check the NDAS device connection.

To close this wizard, click Finish.
string.translation:
Du har vellykket registreret NDAS-enheden. 

Imidlertid kan NDAS-enheden ikke findes og kan ikke tilsluttes nu. Kontrollér NDAS-enhedens forbindelse.

Klik på Afslut for at lukke denne guide.

string.base:
You have successfully registered and the NDAS device is connected. 

However, there is no mountable NDAS device found at this time. Please check the status from the task bar icon menu.

To close this wizard, click Finish.
string.translation:
Du har vellykket registreret NDAS-enheden. 

Imidlertid kan NDAS-enheden ikke findes og kan ikke tilsluttes nu. Kontrollér NDAS-enhedens forbindelse.

Klik på Afslut for at lukke denne guide.

string.base: Are you sure you want to remove the Write Key?\r\nYou cannot mount this device as Read/Write anymore without the Write Key.
string.translation: Er du sikker på at du vil fjerne Skriv-nøglen (Write key)?\r\nDu kan ikke mere tilslutte denne enhed som Læs/Skriv-enhed uden Skriv-nøglen.

string.base: This NDAS device is being used by another host who has the Read/Write access to the NDAS device. And shared-write mode cannot be used at this time.\r\nWould you like to request the Read/Write access of the NDAS device?
string.translation: Denne NDAS-enhed bruges af anden vært, som har Læse/Skrive-adgang til NDAS-enheden. Og delt skrive-modus kan ikke bruges på dette tidpunkt.\r\nVil du anmode om Læse/Skrive-adgang til NDAS-enheden?

string.base: Please wait while connecting to the host...
string.translation: Vent, mens der oprettes forbindelse til værten...

string.base: Unit Device information is not available
string.translation: Information om enheden er ikke tilgængelig

string.base: Do not show a confirmation dialog on removing the Write Key
string.translation: Vis ikke en bekræftelsesdialog ved fjernelse af Skriv-nøglen (Write key)

string.base: Do not show a confirmation dialog on deregistering an NDAS device
string.translation: Vis ikke en bekræftelsesdialog ved afregistrering af en NDAS-enhed

string.base: Do not show a confirmation dialog on dismounting an NDAS device
string.translation: Vis ikke en bekræftelsesdialog ved frakobling af en NDAS-enhed

string.base: Do not show a confirmation dialog on dismounting all of the NDAS devices
string.translation: Vis ikke en bekræftelsesdialog ved frakobling af alle NDAS-enheder

string.base: NDAS Device Management is running now.\r\nClick here to register a new NDAS Device to your system.
string.translation: Styring af NDAS-enhed kører nu.\r\nKlik her for at registrere en ny NDAS-enhed på systemet.

string.base: NDAS Device Management is already running.\r\nClick the task bar icon to show the menu such that you can access the features.
string.translation: Styring af NDAS-enhed kører allerede.\r\nKlik på taskbar-ikonet for at vise menuen, så du kan få adgang til funktionerne.

string.base: NDAS Device Management is already running
Please wait while mounting a requested NDAS device...
string.translation: Vent venligst mens en forespurgt NDAS-enhed tilsluttes...

string.base: Please wait while dismounting a requested NDAS device...
string.translation: Vent venligst mens en forespurgt NDAS-enhed frakobles...

string.base: The new user interface language will be applied when you restart the application.
string.translation: Det nye brugergrænsefladesprog anvendes, når du genstarter programmet.

string.base: NDAS Device Management is running now.\r\nClick the task bar icon to show the menu such that you can access the features.
string.translation: Styring af NDAS-enhed kører nu.\r\nKlik på taskbar-ikonet for at vise menuen, så du kan få adgang til funktionerne.

string.base: Deny suspend/hibernation if there are mounted devices
string.translation: Afvis suspend/hibernation hvis der er tilsluttede enheder

string.base: Allowing suspend/hibernation may cause a data corruption and the device may not be available on resuming in multi-write mode.\r\nAre you sure you want to enable this feature?
string.translation: Tilladelse af suspend/hibernation kan forårsage ødelagte data, og enheden vil måske ikke være tilgængelig ved genoptagelse i multi-skrive modus.\r\nEr du sikker på at du vil aktivere denne funktion?

string.base: Are you sure you want to deactivate this NDAS device?\r\nAfter deactivating, you can reactivate this device from the menu
string.translation: Er du sikker på at du vil deaktivere denne NDAS-enhed?\r\nEfter deaktivering kan du genaktivere denne enhed fra menuen

string.base: Are you sure you want to reset the connection to this NDAS device?
string.translation: Er du sikker på, at du vil tilbagestille forbindelsen til denne NDAS-enhed?

string.base: A member of RAID is inaccessible or not configured correctly. RAID system will be running in degraded mode. Use NDAS Bind Management tool for more information.\r\n%1!s!
string.translation: Et element af RAID er utilgængeligt eller konfigureret forkert. RAID-systemet vil køre i forringet modus. Brug NDAS Bind Management værktøjet for mere information.\r\n%1!s!

string.base: The NDAS Device is running in degraded mode
NDAS Device is running in normal status\r\n%1!s!
The RAID is now running in recovery mode. Use NDAS Bind Management tool for more information.\r\n%1!s!
string.translation: RAID kører nu i genoprettelsesmodus. Brug NDAS Bind Management værktøjet for mere information.\r\n%1!s!

string.base: Connection(s) to one or more NDAS device(s) has been recovered.\r\n%1!s!
string.translation: Forbindelsen til én eller flere NDAS-enheder er genoprettet.\r\n%1!s!

string.base: The RAID is now fully recovered.\r\n%1!s!
The RAID is in failure state. Use NDAS Bind Management tool for more information\r\n%1!s!
string.translation: RAID er i fejltilstand. Brug NDAS Bind Management værktøjet for mere information\r\n%1!s!

string.base: NDAS Device Management\r\nNDAS Service is not available.
Migration is required. Use NDAS Bind management to migrate.
string.translation: Migrering nødvendig. Brug NDAS Bind management til at migrere.

string.base: Conflicting RAID information. Use NDAS Bind management to resolve conflicts.
string.translation: Uoverensstemmende RAID-information. Brug NDAS Bind management til at afhjælpe uoverensstemmelser.

string.base: Do not show a warning dialog when mounting RAID in degraded mode
string.translation: Vis ikke en advarselsdialog ved tilslutning af RAID i forringet modus

string.base: Please wait while checking for a software update...
string.translation: Vent, mens der kontrolleres for softwareopdatering...

string.base: An error occurred while checking a software update.
string.translation: Der opstod en fejl under kontrol for softwareopdatering.

string.base: In the future, do not show me this dialog box.
string.translation: Vis ikke denne dialogboks i fremtiden.

string.base: The following hosts are using this NDAS device.\r\nSome information may not be available.
string.translation: Følgende værter bruger denne NDAS-enhed.\r\nNogle informationer er måske ikke tilgængelige.

string.base: Click here to refresh the list.
string.translation: Klik her for at opdatere listen.

string.base: Hardware Information about your NDAS device
Completing the NDAS Device Registration Wizard
Click here to save as a file.
string.translation: Klik her for at gemme som en fil.

string.base: Optionally, you can save the registration to the file for registering from other computers.
string.translation: Alternativt kan du gemme registreringen til filen for registrering fra andre computere.

string.base: To register the NDAS device, please enter the NDAS device ID. The ID and Write Key are located on the bottom of the NDAS device.\r\n\r\nNDAS device ID is composed of 20 characters.
string.translation: For at registrere NDAS-enheden skal du indtaste NDAS-enhedens ID. ID'en og Skriv-nøglen (Write key) findes på undersiden af NDAS-enheden.\r\n\r\nNDAS-enhedens ID består af 20 tegn.

string.base: Please enter the NDAS device ID.
Write Key is needed for Read/Write mode. It is composed of 5 characters.
string.translation: Skriv-nøglen er nødvendig for Læs/Skriv-funktion. Den består at 5 tegn.

string.base: Click Next when you finish.\r\nIf the NDAS device ID and/or the Write Key is invalid, Next will not be enabled.
string.translation: Klik på Næste for at afslutte.\r\nIf NDAS-enhedens ID og/eller Skrive-nøgle er ugyldig, du kan ikke trykke på Næste.

string.base: Please choose a name for the NDAS device. This name will be used to identify the NDAS device in your system only.
string.translation: Vælg et navn til NDAS-enheden. Dette navn bruges kun til at identificere NDAS-enheden i systemet.

string.base: The name can be up to 30 characters long.
string.translation: Navnet kan fylde op til 30 tegn.
Klik på Næste for at afslutte.

string.base: Welcome to the NDAS Device Registration Wizard
Do you want to mount the NDAS device to your system now?
string.translation: Vil du tilslutte NDAS-enheden til dit system nu?

string.base: While mounting the NDAS device, a security warning dialog may appear. You must click "Continue" to successfully mount the NDAS device. Otherwise, it will not be mounted.
string.translation: Der kan fremkomme en sikkerheds-advarselsdialog under tilslutning af NDAS-enheden. Du skal klikke på "Fortsæt" for at tilsluttet NDAS-enheden vellykket. Ellers bliver den ikke tilsluttet.

string.base: Yes, I want to mount this NDAS device as Read/Write Mode.
string.translation: Ja, jeg vil tilslutte NDAS-enheden som Læs/Skriv-funktion.

string.base: Yes, I want to mount this NDAS device as Read-Only Mode.
string.translation: Ja, jeg vil tilslutte NDAS-enheden som skrivebeskyttet (Read-Only) funktion.

string.base: No, I don't want to mount this NDAS device now.
string.translation: Nej, jeg vil ikke tilslutte denne NDAS-enhed nu.

string.base: You need to complete the following information to export the registration data.
string.translation: Du skal udfylde følgende information for at eksportere registreringsdataene.

string.base: Do not export the Write Key.
Display menus and dialogs in the following language:
string.translation: Vis menuer og dialoger i følgende sprog:

string.base: Display an alert when connection to an NDAS device is lost.
string.translation: Vis en advarsel, når forbindelsen til en NDAS-enhed afbrydes.

string.base: Display an alert when connection to an NDAS device is unstable.
string.translation: Vis en advarsel, når forbindelsen til en NDAS-enhed er ustabil.

string.base: Disable Auto Play for all fixed hard drives.
string.translation: Deaktiver Auto Play for alle faste harddiske.

string.base: Yes, I want to mount this device as Read/Write access mode.
string.translation: Ja, jeg vil tilslutte denne enhed som Læs/Skriv-funktion.

string.base: %1!s! is now available to mount.\r\nDo you want to mount the device to your system now?
string.translation: %1!s! er nu tilgængelig for tilslutning.\r\nVil du tilslutte enheden til dit system nu?

string.base: Yes, I want to mount this device as Read-Only access mode.
string.translation: Ja, jeg vil tilslutte denne enhed som skrivebeskyttet (Read-Only) funktion.

string.base: No, I don't want to mount this device now.
string.translation: Nej, jeg vil ikke tilslutte denne enhed nu.

string.base: Deactivation of the NDAS device will end communication between your system and the device. However, the device is still registered on your system. This allows the device to be activated without re-registration.
string.translation: Deaktivering af NDAS-enheden vil afsluttet kommunikationen mellem systemet og enheden. Enheden vil dog stadig være registreret på systemet. Derved kan enheden aktiveres uden ny registrering.

string.base: You can reset the connection to the NDAS device.
string.translation: Du kan tilbagestille forbindelsen til NDAS-enheden.

string.base: You can save the registration to the file and import it from other computers.
string.translation: Du kan gemme registreringen til filen og importere den fra andre computere.

string.base: Mounting the requested NDAS device, please wait...
string.translation: Den ønskede NDAS-enhed tilsluttes, vent venligst...

string.base: Dismounting the requested NDAS device, please wait...
string.translation: Den ønskede NDAS-enhed frakobles, vent venligst...
